Santa Maria da Boca do Monte, January 30, 1841

Illustrious Sir João Antônio

Lieutenant-Colonel Manuel Lucas de Oliveira, who is on the march with the brigade under his command to the municipality of Piratini; and who will be on this side of the Picada tomorrow or the day after, has recommended that I ask Your Lordship, General-in-Chief, to demand it from Your Lordship.

I take this opportunity to greet Your Lordship.

I remain, with esteem and consideration, Your Lordship's  
Serafim Joaquim de Alencastre

Nota bene Leite. I am proceeding to Piratini and it is necessary for me to go that way for greater security.
